snippet: At Spec’s Records and Tapes in Coral Gables, the music didn’t stop and neither did the memories.
abstract: People mourn news that Spec's Records and Tapes in Coral Gables, Fla, flagship and last store of music chain founded by Martin Spector, is closing its doors after 65 years.
lead_paragraph: At Spec’s Records and Tapes in Coral Gables, the music didn’t stop and neither did the memories.

headline.seo: After 65 Years, Spec’s Records of Florida Is Closing
headline.main: Florida Record Store Goes the Way of the 8-Track
headline.print_headline: Florida Record Store Goes the Way of the 8-Track
